Next, we will introduce the relevant content of the second phase of Tipcoin activities.
The main highlights of the second phase of Tipcoin activities are as follows: Tipcoin will officially launch its token $tip on September 15th, and users can trade it on Uniswap. Tip Coin will publish an article ahead of launch introducing its token economics, liquidity, and contract details1.
Tipcoin will open the function of claiming $tip tokens. Users can redeem $tip tokens at a certain ratio based on the points they earned in the first phase of the event. Users can participate in different topics and activities through @tipcoineth and $tip to obtain more points and rewards. Tip Coin also regularly holds some interesting challenges and competitions to allow users to showcase their creativity and talents3.
The second phase of Tipcoin event is an opportunity not to be missed. What is Over Protocol? Over Protocolis a layer 1 blockchain network aiming to address storage and dependency issues that many blockchains, including Ethereum, face. Its key feature is providing lightweight and user-friendly full nodes, improving accessibility for individuals to operate on their personal computers (PC) at home.
Funding Superblock builds products, tools, and decentralized applications to flourish the Over Protocol. They raised $8 million from prominent companies and VCs in South Korea across two funding rounds. Investors included SK, Netmarble, DSC, E&Investment, and others
Airdrop Plan Their announce the Over Community Access Program (OCAP) to allow more persons to stake $OVER and participate in the ecosystem as validators. The OCAP offers opportunities for early ecosystem contributers to earn $OVER and join in Over ecosystem with various quests before the mainnet launch. How to join Over Protocol? content:
ChatGPT is a powerful conversational generation model introduced by OpenAI. It was developed by OpenAI researchers using large-scale text data for training. The development of ChatGPT has gone through multiple iterations and improvements.
The initial version was the GPT (Generative Pre-training) model, which used the Transformer architecture and an autoregressive generation mechanism. The GPT model was pre-trained on a large corpus of text data, acquiring rich language knowledge and semantic understanding. Then, through fine-tuning on specific tasks, the model became capable of generating relevant responses based on inputs.
Building upon the success of the GPT model, the OpenAI team decided to further develop ChatGPT, a model specifically designed for dialogue generation. They made a series of improvements to enhance the model’s understanding and generation of conversations.
ChatGPT employs an approach called adversarial training to improve the quality of dialogue generation. This approach involves pitting the model against an enhanced version of itself, enabling the model to better comprehend context and generate reasonable replies. Additionally, OpenAI introduced a technique called “decoding” to better control the length and content of the model’s responses.
The development of ChatGPT also involved several significant milestones. For example, in its earlier versions, ChatGPT could generate inaccurate or inappropriate responses, leading to discussions on the model’s credibility and potential risks. To address these issues, OpenAI adopted a “counterfactual evaluation” method, seeking feedback by asking users how they would respond to the model-generated dialogue. This method has helped improve the model’s behavior and response quality.
The release of ChatGPT has had a significant impact on people’s lives. It can be utilized in various dialogue scenarios, including assisting users in problem-solving and providing entertainment and leisure. For instance, in customer service, ChatGPT can offer instant help and support, alleviating the workload of human customer representatives.
Furthermore, ChatGPT can be employed in the field of education and learning. It can provide real-time Q&A and explanations, aiding students in understanding and mastering knowledge. In terms of language learning, ChatGPT can offer learners opportunities for real-time conversation practice and language exchange, enhancing their language expression and communication abilities.
However, ChatGPT also poses challenges and potential risks. As the model is trained on large-scale text data, it may exhibit biases and discriminatory responses. For instance, if there are biases related to gender or race in the training data, the model might generate unequal or stereotypical replies. Additionally, there is a risk of misuse and malicious use of the model, such as spreading misinformation or engaging in online fraud. To tackle these challenges, OpenAI has implemented measures to restrict and monitor the usage of ChatGPT while encouraging users to provide feedback and supervision.
Overall, ChatGPT is a powerful conversational generation model with extensive applications in people’s daily lives. However, it is important to remain vigilant and acknowledge its potential risks to ensure its responsible use and maximize its value.
summary:
ChatGPT is a powerful conversational generation model introduced by OpenAI. It was developed by OpenAI researchers using large-scale text data for training. The development of ChatGPT has gone through multiple iterations and improvements.
The initial version was the GPT (Generative Pre-training) model, which used the Transformer architecture and an autoregressive generation mechanism. The GPT model was pre-trained on a large corpus of text data, acquiring rich language knowledge and semantic understanding.
title: What Is ChatGPT?

content:
Origin of Left-Handers Day International Left-Handers Day is celebrated annually on August 13th to raise awareness about the advantages and disadvantages of being left-handed in a predominantly right-handed world. It was first observed in 1976 by Dean R. Campbell, founder of the Lefthanders International Inc.
Advantages of being left-handed Sure! Left-handed people have many advantages. They have the ability to fully utilize both sides of their brain, making them excel in many areas. Left-handed people are good at intuitive thinking and have artistic talent. In competitive sports that require high nerve reactions, left-handed people can take advantage of their right-brain ‚Äúneural shortcut‚Äù to quickly attack opponents and win by surprise. Especially in the field of mathematics, left-handed people are more prominent. According to scholars at Johns Hopkins University in the United States, left-handed people almost double the number of children with mathematical talent compared to ordinary people.
summary:
Origin of Left-Handers Day International Left-Handers Day is celebrated annually on August 13th to raise awareness about the advantages and disadvantages of being left-handed in a predominantly right-handed world. It was first observed in 1976 by Dean R. Campbell, founder of the Lefthanders International Inc.
Advantages of being left-handed Sure! Left-handed people have many advantages. They have the ability to fully utilize both sides of their brain, making them excel in many areas.
title: International Left-Handers Day
